title: Kabatotto (Hippo and Thomas)
synopsis: Thomas is a cunning bird who sponges on Hyppo, the good-natured hippopotamus. Although Thomas is a dependent, living in Hyppo's big mouth, he always acts lordly and tries to outsmart his simpleminded host. However, their basic friendship and cooperation endures despite their frequent quarrels. The two play a prime role in this comic series, short yet full of originality.
staff: [['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Yanagawa, Shigeru', ['Script']], ['Nakamura, Mitsuki', ['Art Director']], ['Nunokawa, Yuuji', ['Chief Animation Director']]]
